languages.text: "Можно сказать, что среди командования не нашлось тех, кто готов был бы препятствовать желаниям {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g}, рискуя своим положением и отношениями с Теодорой". {n}Абеляр усмехается.{/n} "Лорд-капитан обладала определенными связями во {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Флоте{/g} — связи, которые она использовала для запроса помощи при конфликте на пограничном мире и которые позволили ей сделать мне предложение, итогом которого стало мое присутствие в ее свите".

traits.locale_text: "Можно сказать, что среди командования не нашлось тех, кто готов был бы препятствовать желаниям {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g}, рискуя своим положением и отношениями с Теодорой". {n}Абеляр усмехается.{/n} "Лорд-капитан обладала определенными связями во {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Флоте{/g} — связи, которые она использовала для запроса помощи при конфликте на пограничном мире и которые позволили ей сделать мне предложение, итогом которого стало мое присутствие в ее свите".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "You could say there was no one among the naval command who was willing to impede the wishes of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. To do so would be to risk their own position and their relationship with Theodora." {n}Abelard chuckles.{/n} "The Lord Captain possessed certain contacts in the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Imperial Navy{/g}, contacts which she used to request help during the conflict on the border world, and which enabled her to make me an offer that resulted in my joining her retinue."
languages.original_text: "Можно сказать, что среди командования не нашлось тех, кто готов был бы препятствовать желаниям {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g}, рискуя своим положением и отношениями с Теодорой". {n}Абеляр усмехается.{/n} "Лорд-капитан обладала определенными связями во {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Флоте{/g} — связи, которые она использовала для запроса помощи при конфликте на пограничном мире и которые позволили ей сделать мне предложение, итогом которого стало мое присутствие в ее свите".

traits.locale_text: "You could say there was no one among the naval command who felt any overwhelming urge to impede the wishes of the Rogue Trader. To do so would be to risk their own position and their relationship with Theodora." {n}Abelard chuckles.{/n} "The Lord Captain possessed certain contacts in the navy, contacts which she used to request help during the conflict on the border world, and which enabled her to make me an offer that resulted in my joining her retinue."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You could say there was no one among the naval command who felt any overwhelming urge to impede the wishes of the Rogue Trader. traits.locale_text: "You could say there was no one among the naval command who was willing to impede the wishes of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. To do so would be to risk their own position and their relationship with Theodora." {n}Abelard chuckles.{/n} "The Lord Captain possessed certain contacts in the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Imperial Navy{/g}, contacts which she used to request help during the conflict on the border world, and which enabled her to make me an offer that resulted in my joining her retinue."

languages.text: “可以这么说，海军指挥部里没人愿意忤逆{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}的意愿，这么做会危及他们自己的地位，还会影响他们与西奥多拉之间的关系。”{n}阿贝拉德笑着说道。{/n}“领主舰长当时在{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}帝国海军{/g}掌握一部分人脉。她正是靠着这些人脉在边境世界的冲突中请求支援，随后又向我发出了邀请，最终让我加入了她的舰队。”
languages.original_text: "You could say there was no one among the naval command who was willing to impede the wishes of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. To do so would be to risk their own position and their relationship with Theodora." {n}Abelard chuckles.{/n} "The Lord Captain possessed certain contacts in the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Imperial Navy{/g}, contacts which she used to request help during the conflict on the border world, and which enabled her to make me an offer that resulted in my joining her retinue."

traits.locale_text: “可以这么说，海军指挥部里没人愿意忤逆{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}的意愿，这么做会危及他们自己的地位，还会影响他们与西奥多拉之间的关系。”{n}阿贝拉德笑着说道。{/n}“领主舰长当时在{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}帝国海军{/g}掌握一部分人脉。她正是靠着这些人脉在边境世界的冲突中请求支援，随后又向我发出了邀请，最终让我加入了她的舰队。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "You could say there was no one among the naval command who was willing to impede the wishes of the Rogue Trader. To do so would be to risk their own position and their relationship with Theodora." {n}Abelard chuckles.{/n} "The Lord Captain possessed certain contacts in the Imperial Navy, contacts which she used to request help during the conflict on the border world, and which enabled her to make me an offer that resulted in my joining her retinue."

languages.text: «Podría decir que no había nadie en los mandos de la Armada que quisiera oponerse a la voluntad de la {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}. Hacerlo habría sido poner en riesgo su propia posición y su relación con Theodora». {n}Abelard ríe levemente.{/n} «La Lord Capitán tenía ciertos contactos en la {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Armada Imperial{/g}, que primero usó para recibir ayuda durante el conflicto en aquel mundo fronterizo y posteriormente para hacerme la oferta por la que acabé entrando en su séquito».
languages.original_text: "You could say there was no one among the naval command who was willing to impede the wishes of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. To do so would be to risk their own position and their relationship with Theodora." {n}Abelard chuckles.{/n} "The Lord Captain possessed certain contacts in the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Imperial Navy{/g}, contacts which she used to request help during the conflict on the border world, and which enabled her to make me an offer that resulted in my joining her retinue."

traits.locale_text: «Podría decir que no había nadie en los mandos de la Armada que quisiera oponerse a la voluntad de la {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}. Hacerlo habría sido poner en riesgo su propia posición y su relación con Theodora». {n}Abelard ríe levemente.{/n} «La Lord Capitán tenía ciertos contactos en la {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Armada Imperial{/g}, que primero usó para recibir ayuda durante el conflicto en aquel mundo fronterizo y posteriormente para hacerme la oferta por la que acabé entrando en su séquito».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「海軍司令部の中に、{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}の意向を妨げようとする者はおりませんでした。そうすることは、自分たちの立場やシオドーラとの関係を危うくすることになるからです」{n}アベラルドは苦笑する。{/n}「ロード・キャプテンは{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}帝国宇宙軍{/g}にあるコネクションを持っていました。そのコネクションを利用して、彼女は辺境惑星での紛争の際に協力を要請したのです。そしてその結果、彼女は私にオファーを出し、私は彼女の従者に加わることになったというわけです」
languages.original_text: "You could say there was no one among the naval command who was willing to impede the wishes of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. To do so would be to risk their own position and their relationship with Theodora." {n}Abelard chuckles.{/n} "The Lord Captain possessed certain contacts in the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Imperial Navy{/g}, contacts which she used to request help during the conflict on the border world, and which enabled her to make me an offer that resulted in my joining her retinue."

traits.locale_text: 「海軍司令部の中に、{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}の意向を妨げようとする者はおりませんでした。そうすることは、自分たちの立場やシオドーラとの関係を危うくすることになるからです」{n}アベラルドは苦笑する。{/n}「ロード・キャプテンは{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}帝国宇宙軍{/g}にあるコネクションを持っていました。そのコネクションを利用して、彼女は辺境惑星での紛争の際に協力を要請したのです。そしてその結果、彼女は私にオファーを出し、私は彼女の従者に加わることになったというわけです」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Man könnte sagen, dass es im Flottenkommando niemanden gab, der gewillt war, sich den Wünschen der {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändlerin{/g} in den Weg zu stellen. Damit hätte man nur die eigene Position und die Beziehung zu Theodora aufs Spiel gesetzt." {n}Abelard lacht.{/n} "Der Lord Captain besaß gewissen Kontakte innerhalb der {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Imperialen Kriegsflotte{/g}. Kontakte, welche sie nutzte, um während des Konflikts auf der Grenzwelt Verstärkung zu erbitten, und durch welche sie mir ein Angebot machen konnte, durch das ich Teil ihres Gefolges wurde."
languages.original_text: "You could say there was no one among the naval command who was willing to impede the wishes of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. To do so would be to risk their own position and their relationship with Theodora." {n}Abelard chuckles.{/n} "The Lord Captain possessed certain contacts in the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Imperial Navy{/g}, contacts which she used to request help during the conflict on the border world, and which enabled her to make me an offer that resulted in my joining her retinue."

traits.locale_text: "Man könnte sagen, dass es im Flottenkommando niemanden gab, der gewillt war, sich den Wünschen der {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändlerin{/g} in den Weg zu stellen. Damit hätte man nur die eigene Position und die Beziehung zu Theodora aufs Spiel gesetzt." {n}Abelard lacht.{/n} "Der Lord Captain besaß gewissen Kontakte innerhalb der {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Imperialen Kriegsflotte{/g}. Kontakte, welche sie nutzte, um während des Konflikts auf der Grenzwelt Verstärkung zu erbitten, und durch welche sie mir ein Angebot machen konnte, durch das ich Teil ihres Gefolges wurde."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Disons que personne parmi le commandement naval n'aurait osé faire obstacle aux souhaits de la {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-marchande{/g}, car cela aurait compromis aussi bien leur propre poste que leur relation avec Théodora, {n}explique Abélard en poussant un petit rire.{/n} La seigneure-capitaine avait des contacts bien placés au sein de la {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Marine Impériale{/g}. C'est grâce à eux qu'elle a pu obtenir des renforts lors du conflit frontalier, puis me faire une offre qui m'a convaincu de me joindre à elle. »
languages.original_text: "You could say there was no one among the naval command who was willing to impede the wishes of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. To do so would be to risk their own position and their relationship with Theodora." {n}Abelard chuckles.{/n} "The Lord Captain possessed certain contacts in the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Imperial Navy{/g}, contacts which she used to request help during the conflict on the border world, and which enabled her to make me an offer that resulted in my joining her retinue."

traits.locale_text: « Disons que personne parmi le commandement naval n'aurait osé faire obstacle aux souhaits de la {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-marchande{/g}, car cela aurait compromis aussi bien leur propre poste que leur relation avec Théodora, {n}explique Abélard en poussant un petit rire.{/n} La seigneure-capitaine avait des contacts bien placés au sein de la {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Marine Impériale{/g}. C'est grâce à eux qu'elle a pu obtenir des renforts lors du conflit frontalier, puis me faire une offre qui m'a convaincu de me joindre à elle. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Donanma komutasında {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir'in{/g} taleplerine karşı gelmeye cüret edecek kimse yoktu denebilir. Buna kalkışsalardı kendi konumlarını ve Theodora'yla olan ilişkilerini tehlikeye atarlardı." {n}Abelard gülüyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan'ın {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}İmparatorluk Donanması'nda{/g} bağlantıları vardı. Bunları kullanarak sınır dünyasındaki çatışmalarda yardım talep edebiliyordu. Mevzubahis bağlantılar, divanına katılmamla sonuçlanan teklifi de yapmasına olanak tanıdı."
languages.original_text: "You could say there was no one among the naval command who was willing to impede the wishes of the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. To do so would be to risk their own position and their relationship with Theodora." {n}Abelard chuckles.{/n} "The Lord Captain possessed certain contacts in the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Imperial Navy{/g}, contacts which she used to request help during the conflict on the border world, and which enabled her to make me an offer that resulted in my joining her retinue."

traits.locale_text: "Donanma komutasında {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}'in taleplerine karşı gelmeye cüret edecek kimse yoktu, denebilir. Buna kalkışsalardı kendi konumlarını ve Theodora'yla olan ilişkilerini tehlikeye atarlardı." {n}Abelard gülüyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan'ın {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}İmparatorluk Donanması{/g}'nda bazı bağlantıları vardı. Bu bağlantıları kullanarak sınır dünyasındaki çatışmalarda yardım talep edebiliyordu. Mevzubahis bağlantılar, divanına katılmamla sonuçlanan teklifi de yapmasına olanak tanıdı."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
